channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Dumped Helium Gas cannisters, 22nd September
item.description:
Gas Cannisters have been dumped on the grass at the side of no 1 South Way where it meets Pittsmead Avenue. This is the second time we have reported this.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bourne Vale, Hayes, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street light not working, 22nd September
item.description:
Street light not working very dark and a bit scared to walk down in the dark as it's on a eastat
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Draper Close, Lessness Heath, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Several bikes permanently attached to railings and partially blocking pavement, 22nd September
item.description:
The bikes have seen there for months. Can the council please ask the residents to move to the rear of the house. The public footpath is obstructed for those of us with limited mobility, disabled and visually impaired. Thank you for your attention.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Brand Street, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bollard knocked over please repair or remove, 22nd September
item.description:
A bollard has been knocked over please repair as it’s dangerous.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Griffin Road, Plumstead, London

item.title: Fly tipping at bus stop (something needs to be done ), 22nd September
item.description:
There is regular fly tipping at this bus stop it is horrible something needs to be done

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Griffin Road, Plumstead, London

item.title: Loud private (commercial) rubbish collection in the middle of the night, 22nd September
item.description:
Over recent months the Veolia rubbish truck regularly collects rubbish in the middle of the night (typically 2:15 - 5am) 1-2 times most nights. Unlike hackney council collection, It’s very loud and disruptive. They also often behind rubbish

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Geffrye Estate, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Graffiti, 22nd September

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 177, Croydon Road, Elmers End, London

item.title: Overgrown leaves at base of tree. Narrowing space on pavement, 22nd September
item.description:
There are over growing leaves and branches at the base of a tree located on a corner bend between Goodrich Road and Crystal Palace Road on the pavement outside houses and near a newsagent shop. The pavement is very narrow to pass so please could the leaves and prickly branches be cut back as soon as possible please.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 285, Crystal Palace Road, East Dulwich, London
Report on FixMyStreet
